programme.title: Утро России
programme.desc: "Утро России" - четырехчасовое шоу в стиле "инфотейнмент". Каждый день мы говорим о главных событиях, о том, что интересует каждого жителя большой страны, о том, что тревожит, заставляет задуматься и вызывает гордость. В нашей студии мы ждем тех, кто на самом деле делает новости в России и принимает решения на государственном уровне, а также самых авторитетных экспертов в разных областях. Новый формат программы позволяет говорить с гостями студии обстоятельно и подробно. Используя новейшие технические возможности нашей студии мы можем подключить к разговору собеседника из любой точки земного шара. Кроме того, чтобы картина была более полной, мы можем использовать видеокадры и сложную компьютерную графику. Из сюжетов специальных корреспондентов вы узнаете о наиболее интересных событиях в области культуры: выставках и концертах, спектаклях и вернисажах, мировых кинопремьерах, музыкальных новинках и гастролях звезд. Любителям мира скорости и адреналина Иван Зенкевич расскажет самые свежие новости с российских автодорог. В его материалах - изменения ПДД, отношения между водителями и пешеходами и, конечно, новинки авторынка. В новой рубрике "Полезное утро" эксперты помогут вам сориентироваться в любой жизненной ситуации. Как выбрать качественный товар? Как защитить свои права? Где можно сэкономить? Ответы на эти и другие вопросы каждый день в утреннем эфире.(n)

В новой рубрике "Полезное утро" эксперты помогут вам сориентироваться в любой жизненной ситуации. Как выбрать качественный товар? Как защитить свои права? Где можно сэкономить? programme.title: О самом главном
programme.desc: Программа "О самом главном" - время заняться своим здоровьем всерьез. Советы лучших специалистов Минздрава и НИИ Питания, актуальные вопросы и новейшие способы лечения - из первых рук.Сергей Агапкин - доктор, специалист по традиционным системам оздоровления - практик и скептик. Предпочитает все проверить и исследовать самостоятельно. Он лично проконсультирует всех желающих, ответит на важные для Вас вопросы и даст четкие рекомендации. Лучшие специалисты страны подтвердят все самые главные утверждения и поделятся опытом.Мы переводим с медицинского языка на простой, разбираем продукты по составу, проводим эксперименты и проверяем ваши знания о себе. Каждый день мы прощаемся с мифами и даем компетентные ответы на самые наболевшие вопросы. Здоровье больше не скучная тема - мы проверяем любопытные факты и находим здоровое решение каждой проблемы.Рубрики: "Качество жизни", "Продукт дня", "История болезни" и, конечно, рубрика "Спроси доктора", в которой доктор Агапкин ответит на все Ваши вопросы.(n)

programme.title: "60 минут" с Ольгой Скабеевой и Евгением Поповым
programme.sub-title: Ток-шоу 60 минут с Ольгой Скабеевой и Евгением Поповым
programme.desc: Ежедневное социально-политическое ток-шоу, в котором ведущие и гости обсуждают главную тему текущего дня. В студию приглашаются политические и общественные деятели, эксперты по актуальной проблематике.(n)

programme.title: Прямой эфир
programme.desc: Ведущий Михаил Зеленский вместе со зрителями и экспертами обсуждает самые злободневные вопросы, рассказывает о необычных и поучительных историях из жизни и приглашает в студию непосредственных участников этих событий.(n)

programme.title: Утро России
programme.desc: "Утро России" - четырехчасовое шоу в стиле "инфотейнмент". Каждый день мы говорим о главных событиях, о том, что интересует каждого жителя большой страны, о том, что тревожит, заставляет задуматься и вызывает гордость. В нашей студии мы ждем тех, кто на самом деле делает новости в России и принимает решения на государственном уровне, а также самых авторитетных экспертов в разных областях. Новый формат программы позволяет говорить с гостями студии обстоятельно и подробно. Используя новейшие технические возможности нашей студии мы можем подключить к разговору собеседника из любой точки земного шара. Кроме того, чтобы картина была более полной, мы можем использовать видеокадры и сложную компьютерную графику. Из сюжетов специальных корреспондентов вы узнаете о наиболее интересных событиях в области культуры: выставках и концертах, спектаклях и вернисажах, мировых кинопремьерах, музыкальных новинках и гастролях звезд. Любителям мира скорости и адреналина Иван Зенкевич расскажет самые свежие новости с российских автодорог. В его материалах - изменения ПДД, отношения между водителями и пешеходами и, конечно, новинки авторынка. В новой рубрике "Полезное утро" эксперты помогут вам сориентироваться в любой жизненной ситуации. Как выбрать качественный товар? Как защитить свои права? Где можно сэкономить? Ответы на эти и другие вопросы каждый день в утреннем эфире.(n)

Из сюжетов специальных корреспондентов вы узнаете о наиболее интересных событиях в области культуры: выставках и концертах, спектаклях и вернисажах, мировых кинопремьерах, музыкальных новинках и гастролях звезд. Любителям мира скорости и адреналина Иван Зенкевич расскажет самые свежие новости с российских автодорог. В его материалах - изменения ПДД, отношения между водителями и пешеходами и, конечно, новинки авторынка. В новой рубрике "Полезное утро" эксперты помогут вам сориентироваться в любой жизненной ситуации. Как выбрать качественный товар? Как защитить свои права? Где можно сэкономить? Ответы на эти и другие вопросы каждый день в утреннем эфире.(n)

programme.title: О самом главном
programme.desc: Программа "О самом главном" - время заняться своим здоровьем всерьез. Советы лучших специалистов Минздрава и НИИ Питания, актуальные вопросы и новейшие способы лечения - из первых рук.Сергей Агапкин - доктор, специалист по традиционным системам оздоровления - практик и скептик. Предпочитает все проверить и исследовать самостоятельно. Он лично проконсультирует всех желающих, ответит на важные для Вас вопросы и даст четкие рекомендации. Лучшие специалисты страны подтвердят все самые главные утверждения и поделятся опытом.Мы переводим с медицинского языка на простой, разбираем продукты по составу, проводим эксперименты и проверяем ваши знания о себе. Каждый день мы прощаемся с мифами и даем компетентные ответы на самые наболевшие вопросы. Здоровье больше не скучная тема - мы проверяем любопытные факты и находим здоровое решение каждой проблемы.Рубрики: "Качество жизни", "Продукт дня", "История болезни" и, конечно, рубрика "Спроси доктора", в которой доктор Агапкин ответит на все Ваши вопросы.(n)

programme.title: "60 минут" с Ольгой Скабеевой и Евгением Поповым
programme.sub-title: Ток-шоу 60 минут с Ольгой Скабеевой и Евгением Поповым
programme.desc: Ежедневное социально-политическое ток-шоу, в котором ведущие и гости обсуждают главную тему текущего дня. В студию приглашаются политические и общественные деятели, эксперты по актуальной проблематике.(n)

programme.title: Прямой эфир
programme.desc: Ведущий Михаил Зеленский вместе со зрителями и экспертами обсуждает самые злободневные вопросы, рассказывает о необычных и поучительных историях из жизни и приглашает в студию непосредственных участников этих событий.(n)

programme.title: Утро России
programme.desc: "Утро России" - четырехчасовое шоу в стиле "инфотейнмент". Каждый день мы говорим о главных событиях, о том, что интересует каждого жителя большой страны, о том, что тревожит, заставляет задуматься и вызывает гордость. В нашей студии мы ждем тех, кто на самом деле делает новости в России и принимает решения на государственном уровне, а также самых авторитетных экспертов в разных областях. Новый формат программы позволяет говорить с гостями студии обстоятельно и подробно. Используя новейшие технические возможности нашей студии мы можем подключить к разговору собеседника из любой точки земного шара. Кроме того, чтобы картина была более полной, мы можем использовать видеокадры и сложную компьютерную графику. Из сюжетов специальных корреспондентов вы узнаете о наиболее интересных событиях в области культуры: выставках и концертах, спектаклях и вернисажах, мировых кинопремьерах, музыкальных новинках и гастролях звезд. Любителям мира скорости и адреналина Иван Зенкевич расскажет самые свежие новости с российских автодорог. В его материалах - изменения ПДД, отношения между водителями и пешеходами и, конечно, новинки авторынка. В новой рубрике "Полезное утро" эксперты помогут вам сориентироваться в любой жизненной ситуации. Как выбрать качественный товар? Как защитить свои права? Где можно сэкономить? Ответы на эти и другие вопросы каждый день в утреннем эфире.(n)

programme.title: Праздник святого Иоргена
programme.sub-title: Шедевры старого кино. Х/ф Праздник святого Иоргена
programme.desc: По мотивам романа Гаральда Бергстеда. Накануне крупного религиозного праздника из тюрьмы бежит заключенный. Вместе с сообщником он решает ограбить церковную ризницу. Один из них выдает себя за героя праздника Святого Йоргена, творит разнообразные чудеса на глазах публики и после длительного торга со служителями церкви благополучно уезжает восвояси, прихватив с собой дочь наместника храма...(n)

programme.title: Д/ф Первый среди равных. Анатолий Кторов.
Открытая книга. Анастасия Астафьева. Для особого случая.

Денят започва
programme.desc: Сутрешният блок на БНТ е актуално-информационно предаване. Всеки делничен ден зрителите научават първи най-важните новини от България и чужбина в информационните емисии през 30 минути, както и проблемите и решенията по всички обществено интересни казуси.(n)

programme.title: 100% будни
programme.desc: „100% будни“ - сутрешно ток шоу с водещи Стефан А. Щерев и Надя Иванова.(n)

programme.title: Култура.БГ
programme.desc: предаване за култура с Димитър Стоянович.(n)

programme.title: По света и у нас
programme.desc: Новинарска, информационна емисия, представяща най-важните и актуални събития, случили се през деня в България и по света.(n)

programme.title: Последният печели
programme.desc: забавно-познавателно семейно куиз шоу/п/.(n)

programme.title: Малки истории
programme.desc: Социален слот на БНТ1, стартирал в ефира на Националната телевизия на 6 декември 2011 година. Понеделник, вторник, сряда и четвъртък от 12:35 часа се излъчва кратка документална форма с времетраене 10 минути, а в петък едночасовото публицистично социално ток шоу започва в 14:00 часа, където се търсят решенията.(n)

programme.title: Принцеса Лилифее
programme.desc: Добре дошли в Розовото царство на красотата и добрата воля!(n)

programme.title: Арабела се завръща или Румбурак - крал на света на приказките
programme.desc: Какво е да си омъжена принцеса в света на хората и "крал на приказките" без... царство.(n)

programme.title: Бързо, лесно, вкусно
programme.desc: „Бързо, лесно, вкусно!” е ежедневно кулинарно предаване, чиято цел е да представя на зрителите интересни и практични рецепти, приложими в забързаното ежедневие.(n)

programme.title: Светът и ние
programme.desc: "Светът и ние" е новото предаване на БНТ за информация, коментар и анализ на международната политика. Излъчва се всеки делничен ден, от 16.40 до 17 часа по БНТ1.(n)

programme.desc: "Светът и ние" е новото предаване на БНТ за информация, коментар и анализ на международната политика. Излъчва се всеки делничен ден, от 16.40 до 17 часа по БНТ1.(n)

programme.desc: Новинарска, информационна емисия, представяща най-важните и актуални събития, случили се през деня в България и по света.(n)

programme.title: Още от деня
programme.desc: Публицистичното предаване на БНТ 1 “Още от деня” Ви дава първите коментари на горещите теми от деня. Всеки делник екипът на предаването търси първите реакции по най-важните събития.(n)

programme.title: Следите остават
programme.desc: Предаването за разследваща журналистика “Следите остават” се занимава с важни, сериозни и общественозначими теми.(n)

programme.title: Бързо, лесно, вкусно
programme.desc: „Бързо, лесно, вкусно!” е ежедневно кулинарно предаване, чиято цел е да представя на зрителите интересни и практични рецепти, приложими в забързаното ежедневие.(n)

programme.title: По света и у нас
programme.desc: Новинарска, информационна емисия, представяща най-важните и актуални събития, случили се през деня в България и по света.(n)

programme.title: Панорама с Бойко Василев
programme.desc: Как се случват новините? Какво се крие зад тях? Кои са главните герои? Какви са основните коментари? Какво следва от всичко това? Всеки петък "Панорама" търси отговорите в 60 минути.(n)

programme.title: Извън играта
programme.desc: „Извън играта” е предаване за живота извън… сцената, спорта, екрана. Показва популярните личности в необичайна и непозната светлина. Гости на водещата Люба Пашова са популярни лица от различни обществени сфери – спортисти, актьори, музиканти, журналисти. Предаването опитва да надникне зад завесите, да изведе на преден план това, което не знаем за популярните личности.(n)

programme.title: Иновативно
programme.desc: Предаване за новостите в науката, технологиите и бизнеса.(n)

programme.title: The Fosters

programme.desc: Fletch tries to ensure that Godber has not blown his chances of early release after he gets into a fight a week before his parole board hearing. Final episode of the classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Richard Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Brent's ego gets a boost when he is headhunted by public speaking agency Cooper and Webb, and Trudy's birthday party gets into full swing with the insufferable boss explaining exactly what he'd like to do to the female members of the Corrs.(n)

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Brent makes easy money moonlighting as a motivational speaker at a business seminar and Gareth finds a new friend in the form of a know-it-all IT engineer with a love of kung fu movies (Darkplace star Matthew Holness). Ricky Gervais and Mackenzie Crook star in the award-winning comedy set in the workplace and filmed in documentary style.(n)

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The staff are in a charitable mood on Red Nose Day, with Gareth hopping everywhere, quiet accountant Keith doing his best Ali G impersonation and Dawn selling kisses for a pound. It is also a chance for David Brent to show just how wacky he can be. From October 2002.(n)

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Slough's Wernham Hogg is about to undergo more changes and David Brent shares the secrets of his unique management philosophy with a trade magazine. Meanwhile, Gareth is determined to demonstrate the range of his abilities and Tim puts a proposition to Dawn.(n)

programme.title: The Real McCoy
programme.desc: Athlete Judy Simpson and comedian Ian Edwards make a guest appearance as the series ends its run.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: Cathy seems reluctant to reveal any information about her new boyfriend, Mark refuses to talk about why his wife has thrown him out, and Dermot lies to his fiancee's parents about his job - all of which makes Agnes feel her family is becoming too secretive. Comedy, written by and starring Brendan O'Carroll.(n)

programme.title: The Cleaner
programme.desc: Wicky arrives at a stately home to clean up the aftermath of a burglary gone wrong. Its aristocratic owner is keen to tell Wicky all about her illustrious ancestors, her collection of priceless antiques, and what the world is coming to. When Wicky discovers that there might be more to this case than what meets the eye, he faces a moral dilemma. Telling the difficult truth or accepting a free Aston Martin - his dream car. Comedy, with Greg Davies, and guest star Stephanie Cole.(n)

programme.title: The Cleaner
programme.desc: Wicky attends the home of a 23-year-old social media influencer with millions of followers and an obsession with the 1980s. Wicky finds himself surrounded by the relics of 'Home Alone' Hosea's childhood - one of which, a dangerously malfunctioning arcade machine, has recently electrocuted a repairman. Wicky does his usual professional job of clearing up the mess, but Hosea is furious - the gory remains were perfect viral content and he was planning a live stream from the scene of the accident. Now, however, his house is horrifyingly clean. Comedy, starring Greg Davies, with Layton Williams.(n)

programme.title: The Cleaner
programme.desc: Crime scene cleaner Wicky heads to the countryside after a burglar was interrupted by a shotgun-toting farmer, who administered a bit of traditional 'rural justice', leaving something of a mess. Wicky discovers that the holiday home is owned by his first 'proper' girlfriend, Maggie, offering an unforeseen opportunity to catch up on things over a nice cup of tea - and a bloodstained-horrifying scene. Comedy, starring Greg Davies, with Norton James, Gavin Joseph and Zita Sattar.(n)

programme.title: Ricky & Ralf's Very Northern Road Trip
programme.desc: Ricky and Ralf hit Yorkshire in their quest to find the true North, with a boxing session in Leeds, chocolate in York, curry in Bradford and 'Dracula town' Whitby on Halloween.(n)

programme.title: The Fosters
programme.desc: Sonny is commissioned by an attractive new neighbour to paint a nude portrait of her as a gift for her husband's upcoming birthday.(n)

programme.title: The Fosters
programme.desc: With both father and son having been made redundant, Sonny makes a rash decision - he's going to enlist in the Army!(n)

programme.title: The Fosters
programme.desc: After a morning with too many jobs on her plate, Pearl goes to work in a foul mood. A pleasant meal with her boss, however, soon turns the day around.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Mrs Khan announces she is running a stall at the city farm to promote the supermarket's new organic range, but her husband couldn't be less interested. He wants to know why he, of all people, hasn't been invited to a royal reception in Birmingham being attended by none other than Prince Charles. But then he hears His Royal Highness may be dropping in to the city farm, and he sees his chance - only to discover he still won't get anywhere near the future king unless he can impress the formidable head of the welcoming committee, Marina Fairchild (Belinda Lang, 2point4 Children).(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Shazia is looking forward to having fun with her friends as the day of her hen party arrives, only for a few unwelcome guests to tag along - and she ends up being bombarded with everyone's stories of married life. Meanwhile, Amjad has his stag do, which is being organised by his future father-in-law Mr Khan, so surely nothing can go wrong. Back at the house, the groom is put in a compromising position - and when the two parties collide, the wedding is left hanging in the balance. Kate Robbins guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del feels down on his luck after the council rejects his application for a home improvement grant, but his spirits are raised when he hears about a fancy-dress party across town. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield star as the wheeler-dealers in the first part of the Christmas 1996 trilogy. With Tessa Peake-Jones, Gwyneth Strong, Douglas Hodge and Angela Bruce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del encounters an old flame from almost 20 years previously, and Rodney experiences the joys of dating - but the brothers soon face awkward questions from the past. David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst star, with Diane Langton (The Rag Trade).(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del and Rodney mourn Grandad's death, and feel gratified to see such a good turn-out of friends and relatives at his funeral - even if most people are more interested in the food afterwards. However, one of the guests, a certain long-lost seafaring uncle, ends up outstaying his welcome. Long-running comedy, introducing Buster Merryfield to the cast as Uncle Albert.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Uncle Albert has a nasty fall into the cellar at the Nag's Head, but turns his injury into a profit-making opportunity - eagerly egged on by wheeler-dealer Del-Boy. Vintage comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney aspires to be a pop star, taking on the role of the drumless drummer in Mental Mickey's band but, not surprisingly, Del-Boy manages to ruin his chances. With a guest appearance by DJ Mike Read, alongside David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters agree to dog-sit while Boycie and Marlene go on holiday, and happily tuck into the fresh meat lovingly provided for their charge, scarcely suspecting what lies ahead. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del pays a stripper to attend a party at the Nag's Head with Rodney, who has been bet by Mickey Pearce that he cannot find a date for the occasion. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.desc: The Royle campervan hits the North-East to visit the Angel of the North and a working coal mine, and to meet local pigeon-racers, food bank heroes and a football legend.(n)

programme.title: Ricky & Ralf's Very Northern Road Trip
programme.desc: The duo hit South Yorkshire to join a brass band, visit a cave in Derbyshire named the Devil's Arse, eat high-end Yorkshire pudding and busk with local hero John Shuttleworth.(n)

programme.title: Marley's Ghosts
programme.desc: Marley's attempts to befriend her neighbours are disrupted by her wayward niece. Meanwhile, Adam, Michael and the Vicar enjoy a night out. Supernatural sitcom, starring Sarah Alexander and John Hannah.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Mr Khan and Dave are organising rival Muslim days at the community centre, and while Dave has opted to highlight the importance of women in Islam, Mr Khan is convinced his fun day with a bouncy mosque and 'pin the beard on the imam' stall will be far more popular. There's just one problem - he is forced to bring his stroppy niece with him, and there is a VIP guest he is desperate to impress. Adil Ray and Matthew Cottle star, with a guest appearance from Baroness Warsi.(n)

programme.title: The Fosters
programme.desc: Pearl and Samuel's 20th wedding anniversary is just a couple of days away and he's arranged a surprise second honeymoon trip to celebrate.(n)

programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: Mavis goes to a wedding, but Gastric warns Granville of the danger of leaving her alone in a romantic setting. Eric, Cyril and Mr Newbold consider exploring their feminine side, while Mrs Featherstone is concerned that Mrs Rossi is becoming a bad influence on the shop, and Kath is on the receiving end of a new technique for matching customers to the perfect product.(n)

programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: Granville has to deal with a malfunctioning till, while Eric and Cyril decide it is time to show some macho spirit in the home of the Tour de Yorkshire and get back in the saddle. Meanwhile, Leroy tells Beth about his sneaky plan to find a blind date for Ruby, and Mr Newbold is sent on a mission by Mrs Featherstone to find out more about Mrs Rossi and whether she poses a threat to the local shop. But does he discover more than he bargained for?(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Dreading the sad moment, Khan prepares to drop off beloved daughter Alia for her first day at university. Mrs Khan wants the whole family to attend, so Khan has to find a way to get all of them from Sparkhill to Glasgow. However, the car breaks down, forcing him to improvise alternative travel arrangements, which gives all concerned plenty of time for some fond reminiscing about Alia's early years. Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor, Krupa Pattani and Bhavna Limbachia star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Miami Twice - Part One: The American Dream
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Trotters get a chance to escape Peckham for a holiday in the Florida sun - but it means Del leaving his newborn son behind. David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst star, with Buster Merryfield, Tessa Peake-Jones, Gwyneth Strong, Denis Lill and Roger Lloyd Pack.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Miami Twice - Part Two: Oh to Be in England
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Trotters arrive in Florida, and walk straight into disaster after their camper van is burgled and local Mafiosi take a shine to Del-Boy, who bears more than a passing resemblance to their boss. What Del does not know is that they are planning to have him killed as a way of faking the godfather's death to help him escape being sent to prison. Feature-length episode of the comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst, with a cameo appearance by Bee Gee Barry Gibb.(n)

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: A funeral for a pet bird inspires Geraldine to transform the church into an ark and hold a special service for the animals of the village - but David is far from impressed by her stunt. Comedy, starring Dawn French and Gary Waldhorn.(n)

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: Alice shocks Geraldine with a monumental pre-wedding revelation, and the irreverent vicar is pleasantly surprised by David's dashing brother. Comedy, guest starring Clive Mantle, with Dawn French and Emma Chambers.(n)

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.sub-title: The Vicar of Dibley Easter 1996: The Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Geraldine tries to make the supreme sacrifice by giving up chocolate for Lent. Mrs Cropley's also being good, vowing to steer clear of lard and fishpaste pancakes, and even Jim has a bash at self-denial. Meanwhile, Alice's unwavering belief in the Dibley Bunny is ridiculed. Easter special from 1996.(n)

programme.title: Billy Connolly Does
programme.desc: The Big Yin offers words of wisdom on the subject of fatherhood direct from his Florida home, divulging - among other important matters - why pierced nipples are a must-have accessory for any parent.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: Agnes becomes concerned when Dermot announces he wants to ask his childhood friend Buster, a known criminal, to be his best man. programme.sub-title: Miami Twice - Part Two: Oh to Be in England
programme.desc: Part two of two. programme.desc: Real-life cases reveal how video evidence has been used to solve a murder, as police reveal how CCTV footage has unlocked the answer to baffling cases.(n)

programme.desc: The case of Susan Smith, who became an FBI informant to protect her children from her jealous husband's criminal friends. However, her move brought hellish consequences.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Lindsey could leave the store empty-handed when her big entourage forgets to consider her vision. After trying on more than 75 dresses, picky bride Monica has yet to find the one. Princess-obsessed Natalie surprises everyone at her dress fitting.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.sub-title: To Sleeve, or Not to Sleeve
programme.desc: A bride wants a dress that shows off her tattoos, but her mother does not approve. Another customer is given a veil as a family heirloom, and needs a gown that matches it.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: UK
programme.desc: Bride Lisa looks for a dress that will show off her butterfly tattoo. Meanwhile, bride Ashley has lost four stone and is looking for a fitted gown to emphasise her new figure.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: UK
programme.desc: Amber always dreamed of being a princess on her wedding day, but her strict budget may restrict her. Tori thought she wanted a big gown, until she tries a fishtail.(n)

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Olivia Colman finds some surprises in her ancestral history, and her belief that most of those in her family tree emanate from Norfolk turns out to be far from the truth. Olivia is astonished to discover that she needs to travel to India to find out more about her great-great-great grandmother Harriot, who was an orphan in 1811 on a ship bound for England from Calcutta. Harriot's father was an an Englishman, but the identity of her mother, who gave birth to her in a remote Indian village, is a mystery Olivia delights in solving.(n)

programme.title: The Lady Killers
programme.desc: The crimes of Hannegret Donnelly, who battered husband Christopher to death with 78 visible injuries in Aylesbury, Buckinghamshire. In court, it transpired she had been abusing him at home for years.(n)

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: The case of 15-year-old Sierra LaMar, who disappeared on her way to school. Surveillance footage and diligent police work helped to reveal the chilling facts of her destiny. No one ever found a body, but a man was convicted of her murder because evidence was found in his car, including her DNA.(n)

programme.title: The Playboy Murders
programme.sub-title: Bunny Meets Bachelor. Moth to a Flame
programme.desc: When a Playboy model is found dead in a dumpster, it ignites a tabloid media frenzy. As police investigate, her TV star husband heads for the Canadian border.(n)

actor.role: Self - Detective, Buena Park CA Police Dept.

programme.title: Death By Fame
programme.desc: Shocking true stories behind the rise, fall and murder of some of Hollywood's most promising stars, beginning with Amie Harwick.(n)

programme.title: I'm A Creative Animal: A Portrait Of Barbara Hannigan
programme.desc: Classical Music Documentary. Réalisateurs: Barbara Seiler (2014). She ignores limits and loves exploring untouched ground. Barbara Hannigan is one of the most fascinating and multi-faceted artists of our times. She sets new standards as a singer, conductor, and performance artist. The intimate portrait "I'm a Creative Animal" takes the viewer into the world of an exceptional musician ruled by passion and discipline. Her performances possess a breathtaking intensity created by her exquisite virtuosity, musical and theatrical expressivity, and uncompromising... determination.(n)

programme.title: Steve Reich: Phase To Face
programme.desc: Classical Music Documentary. Réalisateurs: Eric Darmon, Franck Mallet (2009). A student of Darius Milhaud and Luciano Berio, musician Steve Reich (born 1936) quickly developed a style all his own inspired by Baroque music, Bartók, Webern and Stravinsky, as well as jazz, traditional music (especially African), and Hebrew cantillation. As a trailblazing exponent of minimalist music, Reich rejected the characteristic complexity of mid-20th-century classical harmony and tonality in order to make large-scale works from minimal materials a single chord, a brief musical... motif, a spoken exclamation - thereby reconciling classical and popular music. In this profile he looks back on the key stages of his 40-years lasting career, from the formation of his own group, Steve Reich and Musicians, to the American avant-garde he helped to create, from new video performances to his quasi-religious music. Despite his success and wide recognition Steve Reich has never renounced his independent spirit. This film is about the artist and his music. From the analogue tapes of his first recorded pieces to current technology of sampling and video. We see him at work and clips from his performances and concerts in Le Havre, Tokyo, Rome, New York and Manchester.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Light By John Neumeier, Hamburg Ballet
programme.desc: Dance. Réalisateurs: Myriam Hoyer (2020). Ghost Light John Neumeier (Choreography) Franz Schubert (Music) Hamburg Ballet David Fray, piano Festspielhaus Baden-Baden, 2020 TV director, Myriam Hoyer A Ghost Light – a single lamp that illuminates the stage when rehearsals or performances are finished – is part of a long theatrical tradition. Legend says that originally, the night light was for the ghosts of former artists so that they may cavort throughout the night and not disturb or disrupt current performances! At this very moment,... because of the pandemic, countless stages, particularly in America, are illuminated by Ghost Lights. The Hamburg Ballet was one of the first ballet companies internationally to return to its studios after the first lockdown. Observing a strict hygiene concept, John Neumeier created ‘Ghost Light’, a new full-length ballet, for his entire ensemble of 55 dancers. The ballet “Ghost Light” deals with isolation and the feelings and fantasies an empty stage may evoke. Developed in fragments using small groups of dancers and under the constraints imposed by Covid-19, the choreography reflects situations, fears, relationships, memories and emotions experienced during the pandemic. John Neumeier dedicates this work to his dancers. For this recording, the solo piano music is performed by the star pianist David Fray whose Franz Schubert recordings inspired the choreographer.(n)

John Neumeier dedicates this work to his dancers. For this recording, the solo piano music is performed by the star pianist David Fray whose Franz Schubert recordings inspired the choreographer.(n)

Alongside them, one of the most exciting pianists of the Nordic jazz scene. Founder of the thrilling label Jazzland and pillar of cross-overs between impro and electro, Bugge... programme.title: I'm A Creative Animal: A Portrait Of Barbara Hannigan
programme.desc: Classical Music Documentary. Réalisateurs: Barbara Seiler (2014). She ignores limits and loves exploring untouched ground. Barbara Hannigan is one of the most fascinating and multi-faceted artists of our times. She sets new standards as a singer, conductor, and performance artist. The intimate portrait "I'm a Creative Animal" takes the viewer into the world of an exceptional musician ruled by passion and discipline. Her performances possess a breathtaking intensity created by her exquisite virtuosity, musical and theatrical expressivity, and uncompromising... determination.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Light By John Neumeier, Hamburg Ballet
programme.desc: Dance. Réalisateurs: Myriam Hoyer (2020). Ghost Light John Neumeier (Choreography) Franz Schubert (Music) Hamburg Ballet David Fray, piano Festspielhaus Baden-Baden, 2020 TV director, Myriam Hoyer A Ghost Light – a single lamp that illuminates the stage when rehearsals or performances are finished – is part of a long theatrical tradition. Legend says that originally, the night light was for the ghosts of former artists so that they may cavort throughout the night and not disturb or disrupt current performances! At this very moment,... because of the pandemic, countless stages, particularly in America, are illuminated by Ghost Lights. The Hamburg Ballet was one of the first ballet companies internationally to return to its studios after the first lockdown. Observing a strict hygiene concept, John Neumeier created ‘Ghost Light’, a new full-length ballet, for his entire ensemble of 55 dancers. The ballet “Ghost Light” deals with isolation and the feelings and fantasies an empty stage may evoke. Developed in fragments using small groups of dancers and under the constraints imposed by Covid-19, the choreography reflects situations, fears, relationships, memories and emotions experienced during the pandemic. John Neumeier dedicates this work to his dancers. For this recording, the solo piano music is performed by the star pianist David Fray whose Franz Schubert recordings inspired the choreographer.(n)

programme.title: Going For The Impossible: The Conductor Mirga Gražinyt-tyla
programme.desc: Classical Music Documentary. Réalisateurs: Daniela Schmidt-Langels (2017). Mirga Gražinyt-Tyla ranks among today's shooting stars of the classical music scene. At the age of only 30 years, the Lithuanian was unanimously selected by the City of Birmingham Symphony Orchestra (CBSO) to be their musical director; succeeding Andris Nelsons and Sir Simon Rattle. Gentle, strong, calm and self confident, she says: "The only thing that could ever stop me is my own lack of imagination.(n)

programme.title: Richard Galliano - 50 Years - Salle Gaveau
programme.desc: Jazz Concert. Réalisateurs: Samuel Thiebaut (2020). Richard Galliano, Anniversary Concert Richard Galliano (accordeon) Richard Galliano has enchanted stages all over the world for fifty years. Accordionist, bandoneonist, composer, Richard Galliano, multifaceted musician, tireless worker always in search of new inspiration, tirelessly rewrites the history of the accordion. This is how he invents the concept of "New Musette", revealing to the musical world the unprecedented and daring image of a revived accordion, between waltzes musettes, jazz... and tango, blues and Brazilian music. The meetings with Chet Baker, Charlie Haden, Ron Carter, Mich el Portal and so many others confirm his musical eclecticism. But Richard Galliano does not stop there. Passionate about classical music from an early age, he happily explores and interprets the works of Vivaldi, Mozart and Bach; in constant search of harmony and musicality, he even broadens his repertoire to film music by adapting the work of Nino Rota. He is also the only accordionist who records for the prestigious German record label Deutsche Grammophon. During this accordion recital, given on the occasion of this anniversary, he will perform works by Debussy, Satie, Chopin, Granados, Michel Legrand, Astor Piazzolla and of course, his own compositions. Recorded on November 12, 2020 at the Salle Gaveau, Paris TV DIrector, Samuel Thiebaut.(n)

programme.title: Claudio Abbado: Hearing The Silence
programme.desc: Classical Music Documentary. Réalisateurs: Paul Smaczny (2003). One of the world's finest and most-respected conductors, Claudio Abbado was legendary in stature, having held the post of musical director with La Scala in Milan from 1968 to 1986, with the Vienna Opera from 1986 to 1991, and the Berlin Philharmonic from 1989 to 2002. A strong advocate of the development of young musical talent, he was instrumental in the foundation of the Chamber Orchestra of Europe, the European Union Youth Orchestra and the Gustav Mahler Youth Orchestra. After a serious... illness, he began the final phase of his career: founding the new Lucerne Festival Orchestra. Filmmak er Paul Smaczny followed his career over the years, regularly filming and interviewing him. In this profile Abbado talks about his life and work, his conception of music, his favourite compositions. Never-before-seen interviews are combined with images of the conductor in rehearsal and in concert, interviews with friends and colleagues, and archival material. The resulting portrait presents this "silent thinker" under a new and unexpected light.(n)

programme.title: Esperanza Spalding - Jazz A Vienne
programme.desc: Jazz Concert. Réalisateurs: Patrick Savey (2012). ESPERANZA SPALDING - JAZZ A VIENNE 2012 Multi-instrumentalist and singer Esperanza Spalding had an eclectic musical upbringing. A graduate of Berklee University, the African American double bass player released her first album "Junjo" in 2006, and "Esperanza" in 2008. Her jazzy style, praised by the critics, acquired a larger following with "Chamber Music Society" in 2010. She played on the stage of the "Théâtre antique" in Vienne on 8 July 2012, in a sophisticated yet accessible performance.(n)

programme.title: José James - Jazz A Vienne
programme.desc: Jazz Concert. Réalisateurs: Mickaël Favard (2019). José James José James (voice, guitar) Marcus Machado (guitar) Aneesa Strings (bass, voice) Aaron Steele (drums) Since bursting onto the international scene a little over a decade ago, José James and his honey-sweet voice are still as bewitching. The Minneapolis artist admits to being inspired by Marvin Gaye, the producer Flying Lotus and John Coltrane for his stylish blend of what makes up Great Black Music. Flitting between raw soul, soul folk, hip hop and jazz, James is in the microcosm of... vocalists capable of keeping the crossover created by Ray Charles in the 50s alive. His first album (The Dreamer, 2008) pays tribute to Martin Luther King. The next one, Blackmagic, features the beatboxer Taylor McFerrin. His fourth album (in the meantime he recorded with Junior Mance, Chico Hamilton, Flying Lotus and the pianist Jef Neve), No Beginning No End, is on Blue Note. The more soulful than ever singer is back with Lean On Me (2018). After leaning on Billie Holiday and John Coltrane, this time he pays tribute to the living legend of American pop and the immense soulman Bill Withers. There are twelve unforgettable tracks by Withers, who celebrates his 80th birthday in July, produced by Don Was and recorded by a dream band: bassist Pino Palladino, Kris Bowers (fabulous Rhodes on the cover of Ain't No Sunshine), Brad Allen Williams and Nate Smith. Recorded on July 02, 2019 at Jazz a Vienne TV Director, Mikaël Favard.(n)

programme.title: Esperanza Spalding - Jazz A Vienne
programme.desc: Jazz Concert. Réalisateurs: Patrick Savey (2012). ESPERANZA SPALDING - JAZZ A VIENNE 2012 Multi-instrumentalist and singer Esperanza Spalding had an eclectic musical upbringing. A graduate of Berklee University, the African American double bass player released her first album "Junjo" in 2006, and "Esperanza" in 2008. Her jazzy style, praised by the critics, acquired a larger following with "Chamber Music Society" in 2010. She played on the stage of the "Théâtre antique" in Vienne on 8 July 2012, in a sophisticated yet accessible performance.(n)

programme.title: José James - Jazz A Vienne
programme.desc: Jazz Concert. Réalisateurs: Mickaël Favard (2019). José James José James (voice, guitar) Marcus Machado (guitar) Aneesa Strings (bass, voice) Aaron Steele (drums) Since bursting onto the international scene a little over a decade ago, José James and his honey-sweet voice are still as bewitching. The Minneapolis artist admits to being inspired by Marvin Gaye, the producer Flying Lotus and John Coltrane for his stylish blend of what makes up Great Black Music. Flitting between raw soul, soul folk, hip hop and jazz, James is in the microcosm of... vocalists capable of keeping the crossover created by Ray Charles in the 50s alive. His first album (The Dreamer, 2008) pays tribute to Martin Luther King. The next one, Blackmagic, features the beatboxer Taylor McFerrin. His fourth album (in the meantime he recorded with Junior Mance, Chico Hamilton, Flying Lotus and the pianist Jef Neve), No Beginning No End, is on Blue Note. The more soulful than ever singer is back with Lean On Me (2018). After leaning on Billie Holiday and John Coltrane, this time he pays tribute to the living legend of American pop and the immense soulman Bill Withers. There are twelve unforgettable tracks by Withers, who celebrates his 80th birthday in July, produced by Don Was and recorded by a dream band: bassist Pino Palladino, Kris Bowers (fabulous Rhodes on the cover of Ain't No Sunshine), Brad Allen Williams and Nate Smith. Recorded on July 02, 2019 at Jazz a Vienne TV Director, Mikaël Favard.(n)

programme.title: Bloody Daughter - Martha Argerich
programme.desc: Classical Music Documentary. Réalisateurs: Stéphanie Argerich (2011). Martha Argerich and Stephen Kovacevich, two giants of the piano, seen by their daughter Stéphanie: a family portrait but also film about the relationship between a goddess mother and her three daughters. How to reach the balance between a family life and a demanding artistic career, a musician life and a marriage.(n)

programme.title: Esperanza Spalding - Jazz A Vienne
programme.desc: Jazz Concert. Réalisateurs: Patrick Savey (2012). ESPERANZA SPALDING - JAZZ A VIENNE 2012 Multi-instrumentalist and singer Esperanza Spalding had an eclectic musical upbringing. A graduate of Berklee University, the African American double bass player released her first album "Junjo" in 2006, and "Esperanza" in 2008. Her jazzy style, praised by the critics, acquired a larger following with "Chamber Music Society" in 2010. She played on the stage of the "Théâtre antique" in Vienne on 8 July 2012, in a sophisticated yet accessible performance.(n)

programme.title: José James - Jazz A Vienne
programme.desc: Jazz Concert. Réalisateurs: Mickaël Favard (2019). José James José James (voice, guitar) Marcus Machado (guitar) Aneesa Strings (bass, voice) Aaron Steele (drums) Since bursting onto the international scene a little over a decade ago, José James and his honey-sweet voice are still as bewitching. The Minneapolis artist admits to being inspired by Marvin Gaye, the producer Flying Lotus and John Coltrane for his stylish blend of what makes up Great Black Music. Flitting between raw soul, soul folk, hip hop and jazz, James is in the microcosm of... vocalists capable of keeping the crossover created by Ray Charles in the 50s alive. His first album (The Dreamer, 2008) pays tribute to Martin Luther King. The next one, Blackmagic, features the beatboxer Taylor McFerrin. His fourth album (in the meantime he recorded with Junior Mance, Chico Hamilton, Flying Lotus and the pianist Jef Neve), No Beginning No End, is on Blue Note. The more soulful than ever singer is back with Lean On Me (2018). After leaning on Billie Holiday and John Coltrane, this time he pays tribute to the living legend of American pop and the immense soulman Bill Withers. There are twelve unforgettable tracks by Withers, who celebrates his 80th birthday in July, produced by Don Was and recorded by a dream band: bassist Pino Palladino, Kris Bowers (fabulous Rhodes on the cover of Ain't No Sunshine), Brad Allen Williams and Nate Smith. Recorded on July 02, 2019 at Jazz a Vienne TV Director, Mikaël Favard.(n)
